mapper.insert: insert into attendance (employee_id, checkin_time, checkout_time, date, remark) values (#{employeeId}, #{checkinTime}, #{checkoutTime}, #{date}, #{remark})
mapper.update: update attendance set employee_id = #{employeeId}, checkin_time = #{checkinTime}, checkout_time = #{checkoutTime}, date = #{date}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from `attendance`
( employee_id = #{employeeId})
order by id ASC
